mapper.sql: id as id,mobile as mobile,name as name,gender as gender,birthday as birthday,citizenship as citizenship,provice as provice,city as city,job as job,monthly_income as monthlyIncome,member_level as memberLevel,member_points as memberPoints,source as source,monthly_consume as monthlyConsume,last_login as lastLogin,status as status,create_time as createTime,update_time as updateTime,batch_id as batchId,md_type as mdType,mapping_keyid as mappingKeyid

if.test: startIndex != null and startIndex >= 0 and pageSize != null and pageSize > 0

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO data_party (mobile,name,gender,birthday,citizenship,provice,city,job,monthly_income, member_level,member_points,source,monthly_consume,last_login,status,create_time,batch_id,md_type,mapping_keyid) VALUES
( #{item.mobile}, #{item.name}, #{item.gender}, #{item.birthday}, #{item.citizenship}, #{item.provice}, #{item.city}, #{item.job}, #{item.monthlyIncome}, #{item.memberLevel}, #{item.memberPoints}, #{item.source}, #{item.monthlyConsume}, #{item.lastLogin}, #{item.status}, now(), #{item.batchId}, #{item.mdType}, #{item.mappingKeyid} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mobile=COALESCE(VALUES(mobile),mobile), name=COALESCE(VALUES(name), name), gender=COALESCE(VALUES(gender),gender), birthday=COALESCE(VALUES(birthday), birthday), citizenship=COALESCE(VALUES(citizenship), citizenship), provice=COALESCE(VALUES(provice), provice), city=COALESCE(VALUES(city), city), job=COALESCE(VALUES(job), job), monthly_income=COALESCE(VALUES(monthly_income), monthly_income), monthly_consume=COALESCE(VALUES(monthly_consume), monthly_consume), member_level=COALESCE(VALUES(member_level), member_level), member_points=COALESCE(VALUES(member_points), member_points), source=COALESCE(VALUES(source), source), last_login=COALESCE(VALUES(last_login), last_login), status=COALESCE(VALUES(status), status), batch_id=COALESCE(VALUES(batch_id), batch_id)
mapper.select: SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
SELECT
SELECT COUNT(id) AS dataCount

SELECT id as data_id,name,gender,age,mobile,email
WHERE id = #{party_id} and deleted = 1

SELECT id,name,gender,mobile,(year(now())-year(birthday)-1) + ( DATE_FORMAT(birthday, '%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m%d') ) as age
(mobile like CONCAT('%',#{audience_name},'%') OR name like CONCAT('%',#{audience_name},'%')) and (status = 0 or status = 2)

SELECT
WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name='data_party'

SELECT * FROM data_party WHERE id IN (SELECT party_id FROM audience_list_party_map JOIN audience_list ON audience_list_party_map.audience_list_id = audience_list.id WHERE audience_list.id = #{audienceId});

SELECT
WHERE id IN (SELECT map_id FROM custom_tag_map WHERE tag_id = #{tagId});

SELECT id
WHERE mapping_keyid = #{mapping_keyid}

SELECT mobile
WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT count(id) as peopleCount,source
WHERE id in
#{item}
group by source

SELECT COUNT(id) AS monthlyCount, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') AS month FROM data_party WHERE create_time >= #{startTime} AND create_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y%m') ORDER BY month
select count(id) as sourceCount , source from data_party group by source

SELECT SUM(countId) as countId FROM (SELECT COUNT(id) AS countId FROM original_data_arch_point UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id) AS countId FROM original_data_customer_tags UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id) AS countId FROM original_data_login UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id) AS countId FROM original_data_member UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id) AS countId FROM original_data_payment UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id) AS countId FROM original_data_population UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id) AS countId FROM original_data_shopping UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id) AS countId FROM wechat_member WHERE pub_id IS NOT NULL) tmpCount
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM data_party WHERE mobile is not null
